title: Archie Americana Series: Best of the Sixties, Vol. 1
description: The sensational sixtiesâ€¦ a time of dreams, hopes, revolution and sociall change! At the forefront of the decade were the nation's youth-- enjoying the latest fads, speaking their minds and defining a generation. Ever timeless, Archie and his friends came along for the ride, exploring both the fun and unique brand of humor, as only they could! Journey back with us now in this eagerly anticipated volume.
author: John L. Goldwater
